website_summaries.verdict: This high-quality option offers users a slim matte liner at an affordable price.
pros: Smooth application dries quickly with a sleek matte finish
Smudge-free formula lasts all day on all skin types
Users appreciate the dark black color
cons: A few customers had issues with the product flaking
A little too thin for some

website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for an inexpensive liquid eyeliner that dries to a matte finish with pretty color intensity, this is the one to choose.
pros: Has a matte finish when dry, which appeals to those who don't like a liquid formula that has a glossy look when dry
Brush is very thin and easy to control
Does a good job for creating a cat-eye look
cons: May crack or flake off, especially if you apply it too heavily
If your skin is oily, it may smudge
Consistency is on the runny side

customer_reviews.title: HOLY GRAIL PRODUCT!! 😁
customer_reviews.text: This is my ride or die eyeliner. Wet n wild megaliner is an ugly step sister compared to her, mind you that I do sometimes get carried away with it and look like Amy Winehouse. Nyx doesn't smudge/budge/and is super opaque. Holy grail product. Only reason it didn't get a full 5 stars is because one of the bristles was messed up but I replaced it with my old nyx one. Anyways try it out you won't be disappointed!!!! 🥰🥰🥰🥰
customer_reviews.author: A 💞

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every liner , gel, liquid Bobby brown, make up forever, maybelline, nyx gel, Sephora... literally all. This is by far the best one!!! I love it! The brush felt is perfect! Matte finish and so much cheaper than the $30 dollar once. A Must buy!!!! Update :::: second time I used it it melted all over my eyelids and gave me raccoon eyes! I really wanted to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Aka

customer_reviews.title: Matte liner, nice brush size for precise wing, NOT great for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Pros: matte liquid liner that doesn’t dry out, has a nice thin brush, easy application, looks great. Cons: will smudge and make eyelid stick slightly when blinking if you have oily skin. Lasted about 4-5 hours before started to smudge. About half of my work day. I really like the application and matte look of it, so I am trying to find techniques that will help prevent the smudging.
customer_reviews.author: Monte

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best eyeliner, but has served it's purpose until I can find a better liquid liner. My biggest complaint is how the liner stays on your lids. It dries smoothly, at first. But with extended use throughout the day, it looks like it crackles in areas, like if you were to break a piece of ice, and that's the effect this liner makes on your eyes. The other issue is with trying to remove this liner. It takes forever! Even with eye makeup remover, specifically designed for nothing more than the purpose of removing eye makeup, this liner is the worst with removal.
customer_reviews.author: cicisbo

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day, doesn't irritate eyes, washes easily
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup... their eyeliner is the best! My eyes are very sensitive and I can't use cheap low quality eyeliner or my eyes get red and dry and irritated.. this eyeliner stays on all day looks freshly applied the entire day and washes off easily. Best of all does not irritate my eyes or skin.. this shipment arrived on time and packaged properly!
customer_reviews.author: nakia

customer_reviews.title: Matte formula not as good as vinyl
customer_reviews.text: For some reason this matte formula makes my eyes water. The vinyl formula doesn't. Now, you'd think that since it says "waterproof" right on the front that the watery eyes that this product causes me to experience would not be an issue. Wrong. This is not fully waterproof. In fact, even with mild watery eyes it will run. I only apply this product ti my upper lash line (not to tight line, just as liquid eyeliner ABOVE my upper lashes) and yet when my eyes water I'll have this stuff running down both the inner and outer corners of my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product especially for its price. As you can see in my video I rubbed it harder than someone would actually rub their eye and it did not come off until I rubbed it excessively. As for water-resistant, it doesn’t wash off when you put water on it or lightly rub it, but if you scrub it with a towel it will come off. It’s oily in texture so water doesn’t bother it with just contact. The marks on the one line on my thumb is all from one dip and I did as many strokes as I could so you could see.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Geer

customer_reviews.title: Bootleg
customer_reviews.text: Not the real thing. I've been buying this exact item for years from CVS or Ulta Beauty without issues. My husband warned me buying makeup from outlets like this but I figured it was ok since I was buying this through Amazon. It made my eyes super itchy and red. Trash.
customer_reviews.author: felipe ayon

customer_reviews.title: Dark, skinny, perfect
customer_reviews.text: If you just need it for a few hours then it’s perfect. Probably after 8 hours it dries up and flakes but I still think this is the best looking eyeliner I’ve ever bought. I normally wear Almay because my eyes are super sensitive and turn red but this also doesn’t give me zombie eyes and it’s darker with a fine brush to make it skinny, just how I like it since I have hooded eyelids.
customer_reviews.author: FoxyRoxy

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof- just don’t swim in it.
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at this eye liner. I have very sensitive eyes and wear contacts. I go through a lot of eyeliners or mascaras because I can’t find one that doesn’t make my eyes burn or tear. I took a risk on this and after 2 weeks, it’s safe. My eyes don’t tear, or burn or go red. Doesn’t smudge Unless you rigorously rub it. I went into my pool with this- not waterproof. Which is fine, comes off easier with face cleaner and is gentler on lid skin. I combined with L’Oreal Voluminous Mascara in very black and I’m good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazongirl

customer_reviews.title: Good color, bad formula
customer_reviews.text: I like the matte shade of this black, however, I wore it to an outside wedding this Summer and I was a bridesmaid and this stuff was all over my eye except where I put it. I had to wipe off and reduce after pictures and it doesn't come off easily with make up remover wipes. Also I don't know who would ever use such a small applicator it is so hard to get a good cat eye. I would like this better if it had a felt tip angled applicator and didn't melt in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: TMM

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Liquid Liner!
customer_reviews.text: I've been liquid or die for many, many years and was thrilled when I found NYX's matte liquid liner. With oily lids and a daily cat-eye liner, this product is gold. Apply once and I'm off for the rest of the day and into the night, even in the Portland rainy months. The fine brush application is great for thin or thick wings and I love that they use a brush! If you've tried and loved discontinued Urban Decay liners, ever used old L'Oreal liquid liner and feel let down with the selection on brush application, long-lasting liquid liner... give this a try in Matte or Vinyl! Note: the vinyl formula can be hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite liner!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite eyeliner ! I’ve used maybelline waterproof eyeliner for years and it’s formula was at times inconsistent. It would also get very flaky soon after applying. And had the shiny look I didn’t like. NYX lasts long, does smudge just a little bit, but not flaky! Has a great matte finish. It took me a few tries to get used to the brush ( linger than I’m used to). Use oil or eye make remover to remove otherwise you’ll just end up with black ( under) eyes.
customer_reviews.author: S. V

customer_reviews.title: Amazing liner for an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: You can hardly tell in my photo due to my dramatic lashes but this liner has become my new favorite. The tip is thin but not flimsy and the black is very rich in color and it doesn’t easily dry out like a lot of liners I’ve purchased! Honestly after seeing @AaliyahJay review this liner I had to get it as she is the queen of winged liners lol But I mean it’s long lasting, affordable and rich in color so why not purchase it?!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great price, stays all day and east to apply
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a new eyeliner since the one I was using for a while was discontinued. I am VERY particular about wanting my liquid eyeliner to be matte. This is matte but still has the tiniest bit of a gloss look. I would prefer it to be truly as matte as matte can be. But it is great for the price and will use for now. It does stay put all day!!
customer_reviews.author: kmarie83

customer_reviews.title: Great applicator brush, but flakes off after a few hours.
customer_reviews.text: Pros and cons to this liquid liner, so 3 stars. I love NYX, but this wasn't the best product. It flakes off very easily after only a few hours, which was disappointing. Application was easy because of a very fine, very easy to use brush. I had the easiest time applying this liquid liner compared to any others I've used, however, this liquid liner just doesn't have staying power. Maybe it wouldn't flake off if I made zero facial expressions and didn't blink? No idea. Not something I'll use regularly - formula is too flaky.
customer_reviews.author: Jan van Eyck

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner and for the price it’s amazing. I use to buy this at ulta for a couple dollars more so this is a steal! Last several months, could possibly last even more but I wear a lot of eyeliner. It does not flake off for me throughout the day stays in place. I’ve had no issues with the brush applicator either. The formula is runny like I’ve seen in other reviews but it’s a liquid eyeliner? It’s not a pen eyeliner so keep that in mind. Very easy to use I recommend this eyeliner to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kaykay

customer_reviews.title: Favorite eyeliner UNTIL IT DRIES AND BECOMES USLESS
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After 3 months it completely dried up. I still think its good, but don't think I would buy it again knowing how quickly it becomes usless. ORIGINAL REVIEW I’m just learning how to wear liquid eyeliner, and read some good reviews about this one, so I got it, and let me tell you how amazed I am! It is super easy to apply, the handle is long enough to give you a good grip, the line can last all day long and won’t smudge, I even wore it to the beach and at the end of the day, after swimming, sweating, tanning, it still was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product for the reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. It's so easy to use and lasts all day without smudging or cracking (at least 15-16 hours). I receive it on subscribe and save every month. It's reasonably priced and I don't have the dread of shelling out a lot of money. I was using Clinique and Estee Lauder for years. They didn't compare to this one. Seriously, for the price - give it a shot. It won't break the bank. I have one that I leave in the hot car all day. It works perfectly fine the next day and doesn't get clumpy or weird.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: favorite eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: as a winged eyeliner lover, ive tried a million and a half eyeliners but this is my go-to. i have oily eyelids and it doesnt smudge at all. super black and matte
customer_reviews.author: eryn hamlin

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful, but tough to use!
customer_reviews.text: This goes on as a nice, heavy matte black, and it lasts all day long once it's on there appropriately! I have a hard time applying it, however, because the brush is long and not tapered well, so the liquid often gets on my lashes or extends somewhere I do not want when I try to apply it. I've worn liquid eyeliner for a long time, so I don't think it's my ability to apply it that is the problem. However, I suppose if you are willing to get used to the style of the tool, the actual eyeliner works great!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this eyeliner for years. You can’t beat the quality at this price range! Nice consistency and very opaque black. The brush has a nice fine tip and it can be used for the thinnest lines to very thick wingtips. I used a primer underneath and it stays put all day; no flaking or creasing. I used to use Stila liquid eyeliner until I discovered this, which is a fraction of the price!
customer_reviews.author: J. W.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this eyeliner.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is easy to apply (as long as your hands aren't shaking) and lasts all day. It stays so well that it's even somewhat difficult to get it off with makeup remover at night! Because of that my only "complaint" is that if I'm clumsy and get some where I don't want it or on my fingers, I really have to fight to get it off. lol Otherwise, this is easily the best eyeliner I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer of Things

customer_reviews.title: Dries fast, matte finish, perfect
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really stays on, my makeup remover even takes a bit of effort to remove it. My favorite part though is that it dries very fast and to a lovely matte finish. Thanks to the dry time I so far havent smudged it onto my eyelids, which is a miracle for me since I have hooded eyes. I'm not personally going to bother buying any other eyeliner unless this one stops being made.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I must have gotten a bad batch --
customer_reviews.text: This liner gets a 1-star because it flakes terribly - within the first 4-6 hours. The pigment is not as deep as I wanted, either. And I feel confident in my rating because I'm a liquid eyeliner connoisseur over many years!! I don't really know why I strayed from my go-to Rimmel Exaggerate line, both the felt-tip liner & pencil definer are great products.
customer_reviews.author: Bebed

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I have had bad luck with other makeup products ordered from Amazon not coming with their tamper-proof seal. I had no such trouble with this product. It came very liquidy not dried up at all. I just have to wait for it to dry. It will smudge when wet. By the end of the day it does look likebsome of it flakes off but still better than many other products I've used
customer_reviews.author: Iulia

customer_reviews.title: NYC Liner Replacement!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. I was actually looking for something to replace my beloved Nyc liquid liner. Since it stopped being sold in the USA I have been hunting for another. This is exactly the same eyeliner, just a different name. It is amazingly easy to use because of the brush tip and it creates sharp lines with no trouble. The liner itself is a rich deep matte black, not shiny but they have that too if it’s your thing. Couldn’t be more satisfied with this product...oh and it’s cheaper here than at Target.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Eyeliner That's Truly Matte
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this liquid eyeliner for years now; I have tried many other drugstore liquid eyeliners, but I always find myself coming back to this. It's a true matte liquid liner, so allow it to dry and you will see a noticeable different between this matte NYX eyeliner and any other drugstore vinyl eyeliner. Works amazing when you are trying to achieve a thin or thick eyeliner look; the thin brush allows you to be more precise with how you want your eyeliner to look like. I highly recommend this NYX matte liquid eyeliner!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing matte liner!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love me a good brush-tip applicator for a nice thin wing! This is by far one of my favorites and you can't beat the price. I recommend wiping off some of the excess product from the brush applicator on the rim of the tube (especially when it's new). If not, it can apply too much liner and not dry fast enough and can smear. This is water-resistant, not waterproof. I usually use a little concealer and setting powder as my eyeshadow base and never have any issues with it smudging or rubbing off or flaking into my contact lenses. I'm so happy I found this liner!
customer_reviews.author: SRS

customer_reviews.title: Easy application and brush doesn't fray.
customer_reviews.text: I've always used Elf liquid eyeliner but it always seems to be sold out. I tried this on a whim and its my new favorite. The black is true black and doesn't smudge or get flaky. The brush doesn't fray or separate like some brands do. Its slim and doesn't take up space in a clutch or small make up bag either. Only slight downside is size. If you like a thick wing like me, you run out fairly faster. Buy a couple of them if you dont want to run out as often.
customer_reviews.author: tara davis

customer_reviews.title: Very expressive
customer_reviews.text: Before I start, I think it is very important to say I am a beginner. In fact, this is my first time EVER doing make-up so, all you beginners: listen up. Very impressed for the price. You can get a fine point out of it! The application is smooth and precise. Unfortunately you cannot put it in you waterline (that's is the image where it looks like I was crying). You can tell what eye was my "practice eye" and which one was for a picture 😂
customer_reviews.author: aspyn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed customer!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love NYX products but disappointed on this eye liner. I bought it based on the reviews and the way it looks on real customer photos. I put it on for the 1st time last week and the eyeliner cracked . I had it on my eyelid maybe about an hr before it did this. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Deceived
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews were definitely deceiving! This liner is completely not worth it. I was so excited to try it based on such positive reviews with pics however this item fell short. Did not last through my work day and even when I tried layering it over my other liner, it got that one to wear off as well. The applicator brush is not good and when it dries, it flakes off. Not a complete waste of money though, at least I know what NOT to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Jean-Baptiste

customer_reviews.title: Really good for an affordable liner
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty smudge-proof after it dries. It does take a little bit of time to dry but nothing crazy. It is not waterproof, don’t cry in it lol. My eyes tend to water in wind or with certain other conditions so I don’t wear it under my eyes just on the top. But if your eyes stay dry, it stays put. I like it a lot for an affordable liquid liner.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Stays all day, but difficult to apply
customer_reviews.text: Solid black eyeliner. Stays all day long, smudge-proof. But difficult to apply. It's a typical brush, with thin flexible bristles. It's not stiff enough, so it's easier to make mistakes. You don't have the same control as you do with a felt tip marker applicator. The product itself is good, but just wish the applicator brush was different. I think I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: MarB

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner for the price
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t particularly but this for the water resistance aspect, but I hate eyeliner that smudges or looks greasy throughout the day and this does not! It lasts all day. My concern was going to be application as I struggle with liquid liner but even application goes smoothly! I haven’t had to redo it yet 🤞🏼The brush is thin and applies evenly. I think this is going to be my go to eyeliner from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Great liner! Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great eyeliner. I love the richness of the black shade, and the consistency of the product. It glides on so nicely. Personally, I prefer the Nyx eyeliner pen over this because it creates better lines, but this is still an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: LeSpicyBrownCowTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeliner out there!
customer_reviews.text: For the price and quality of product, this eyeliner truly can’t be beat. I’ve tried eyeliners that cost 6 times the price of this one and I always find myself coming back to my trusty NYX liner I’ve been using since I was in High School! Gives a beautiful dark black line, and applies smoothly and easily. Good for beginners and long time users as well, can’t recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Amazing liquid eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this eyeliner! I've bought it a few times and still love it. This is the best liquid eyeliner I've ever bought and I'll still continue to buy. I also love how thin the brush is, it helps me get a sharp tail. I prefer my eyeliner kind of thin so this is great for that too!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty decent eyeliner at a great price. The ultra-fine tip makes it easy to achieve razor sharp winged liner. It's definitely not waterproof though. Can be quite easily removed with just water actually, and of course if it were to get wet and you rub your eye then it would smudge. Other than that, it's a nice eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Tamayah Fields

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and a real matte finish, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully matte finish, and lasts really well (I even got rained on while wearing it and it didn't smudge or come off). It's also the perfect texture to make very-fine lines and wings, or to make thicker areas black when you want to do more dramatic eye looks. Love this, will be getting more.
customer_reviews.author: A.E. and Z.A.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product! Cat eye liner!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner... easy application and high quality product and at such a great price! I have used very high end products similar to this but none were as good! Trust me... you love liquid eyeliner? Try this- buy this- you will be a believer too!
customer_reviews.author: Louri Frean

customer_reviews.title: Was exactly what it said it would be.  Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: *Package was good. *Nice Matte Black *brush was thin and long which provided smooth application *lasted all day* *Didn't crack like some eyeliners do If you dont know how to use ink liners with soft long brush, you will need to practice.
customer_reviews.author: ROSI

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this eyeliner stays on matte and it don’t smudge or anything, even when it’s time to go to bed and you wipe it off with soap and water it takes time to come off , will be purchasing again !
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth N

customer_reviews.title: New fave liquid eye liner! Like a tattoo!
customer_reviews.text: This eye liner went above and beyond my expectations! Beware- you NEED makeup remove to get this stuff off. If your eye lids are clean and oil free this liner will stay on all day and night. I love it. Makes for the perfect winged look!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Fairservice

customer_reviews.title: Definitely long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Applied mid day and didn't take it off before bed and went to work the next day with it still crisp. ( I know, horrible for my skin but I did it). I even used it for a cat eye look around my tear ducts and it stayed perfectly. Only negative that I have is that when it dries, it feels tight and somewhat irritating but that may have been because I had it on so long so I can't dock points for that.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Smudges so easily with any water/ tear, but dries so quickly that if you make a mistake you cannot fix immediately with hand/ qtip. The brush is very thick and difficult to draw with (mainly because it’s too soft and bends too easily), the product is not waterproof, and flakes/ smudges after a few hours. Unfortunate because the other Nyx products are generally better
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kim

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous liner!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous liner! Easily one of the best ones I have ever used and it might just become my new go-to. Has a very refined brush and paints on smoothly and precisely. I would say if you dont have much experience in eye liner or dont feel confident applying it, this product may not be the best option as you need to have a very steady hand to apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Matte matte matte...oh and BLACK
customer_reviews.text: This is a seriously black liner, I love that it’s actually matte. However....I suck with this kind of applicator, I am way more precise with pen type so I will say there’s a bit of a learning curve for me. But obviously that’s no fault of the actual product
customer_reviews.author: Amber L. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: It’s not waterproof but this is the BEST eyeliner ever. The brush it perfect to draw wing without fixing it 15 times and it’s a beautiful matte that doesn’t chip like some others do
customer_reviews.author: Allison D

customer_reviews.title: Very good and great for price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this liner. It draws a very nice line, dries nicely and I haven’t had any issues w it lasting. I think because the brush is so stiff, it does make it easier to use most of the time. Every once in a while it makes it harder but I think in general, it helps the not-so-talented/steady hand do better than you normally would. I think this will be my go to liquid liner.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Flakes off very quickly. I just do a thin line around my eye and within an hour spots are missing because the just flaked off. Goes on very easy and love the way it looks right after. Just wish it would stay that way
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Initially impressed but not for long.
customer_reviews.text: Great color goes on thick and dark. Only thing is not too long after applying it runs so ur constantly correcting under ur eyes and inner eye creases removing eye liner that has run. It makes u look tired lol also it is the kind that when left on too long it will “crack” and look broken up n gross.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Scott

customer_reviews.title: Better than other brush tip eyeliners
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use. I hate sponge tip eyeliners so when I find brush tip eyeliners I try them out. Normally I use the L'Oreal eyeliner but decided to give NYX a try. Its great! Dare I say better? Doesnt smudge or crack when my eyes water due to allergies. Think I'm sticking with NYX from now on.
customer_reviews.author: JUDYNSD

customer_reviews.title: Greatest matte for the cheapest price
customer_reviews.text: This dries matte very quickly so I feel like I use a lot of product. The applicator is a good quality i look for a pointy applicator and it could be a little pointer in my opinion but i can always use a one I like from a different product I do that. It's a good size container should last for a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Adonas Cary

customer_reviews.title: The perfect liner! It’s doesn’t smudge and it lasts
customer_reviews.text: I love this liquid liner so much! I actually fell asleep without removing my makeup 🤦🏻‍♀️ But my liner did not smudge one bit. It looked like I just put it on! It’s a nice thin line, very easy to put on and it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Ferrara

customer_reviews.title: It’s lasts
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t say waterproof but it last so long, I did a swatch in my hand and it lasted all night all day! It lasts on the eyes too ;) it’s not completely matte - the hard part is the brush isn’t pointy so it’s hard to get a sharp edge!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet E

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I got it to practice using liquid eyeliner which I've never used. So it's perfect for what I need. You can scratch it off though. It gets flakey. But for someone who only wears it occasionally for nights out it's exactly what I need!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and easy application
customer_reviews.text: This is my everyday eyeliner. It’s smudge-proof and looks beautiful on. It’s so easy to apply. I have a natural oily face and because of my job, I sweat a lot. I only have to touch it up once or twice a day and it’s only on the inside corners of my eyes. I love this eyeliner so much.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: I first got this bc a youtuber said it was pigmented, matte , and cheap. Now that I've tried this, I can confirm it is all of those things. It lasts great on my unprimed oily eyelids lol Just keep your eyes closed until it dried. Don't blink lol
customer_reviews.author: Karol C

customer_reviews.title: It is waterproof! After years of liquid eyeliners this is my new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! The brush type is my favorite style, thin and precise, and the liquid isnt too runny. I love the matte finish it has after a few seconds of drying! I put water on the area I marked twice and tapped around while it was on and there was no smudge. After it soaked on a bit I rubbed by finger over the mark a couple times and it didnt smear at all! I'm so impressed! I cant wait to wear it around!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like how matte it is but even with primer it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like how matte it is but even with primer it was pretty smudged after a work day. It was a bit hot when I wore it but my other liquid eyeliner stayed in with no smudging after running around in the park for a couple of hours. Definitely won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: A++++++
customer_reviews.text: Best eye liquid liner by far! Years using it, and now that Amazon has it for a such a great price, I cannot be happier. Stays alllllll day and longer!
customer_reviews.author: D. B

customer_reviews.title: Nice and dark but could be a little more matte.
customer_reviews.text: This liner works well enough. It's easy to apply and is a nice, dark black. It is a brush so if you're used to using a felt-tip or any other applicator, it'd be wise to tinker with a bit before trying to put it on in a hurry. The reason I'm giving it 4 stars though is that it could be a little more matte. There's still a little shine if you're in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Chelynn

customer_reviews.title: I threw it away.
customer_reviews.text: This product was terrible! It was hard to apply and dried in seconds so trying to clean it up was absolutely terrible. It also started having a chipped look to it after about an hour of wearing. I ended up throwing it away after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Brummette

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely order again
customer_reviews.text: This product is long lasting easy to apply because the brush is not to fat. I enjoy the fact that this eye liner doesn't burn my eyes when accidentally over flowing the brush with to much liquid. Delivered as promised and on time Will definitely order again Thank you
customer_reviews.author: lariena l wilson

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: The only positive thing I can say about this eyeliner is that the brush allows for very sharp wings. Other than that, I bought better liquid eyeliner at the dollar tree as a kid. Doesn't last at all, not even a little bit water resistant, and looks very streaky.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good if you're good at liquid liner. Not for amateurs!
customer_reviews.text: The brush is very precise which I love. I've been using eyeliner for a long time and I got to say, if you're not good at wielding a brush, I would not start with this. The brush is very precise to make thin lines. I really like how it dries pretty quick after application. Some liquid liners take forever to dry which is annoying if you're on the run. If you wait for a few seconds it'll dry pretty quick for this one. It lasts for a decent amount of time. I like it. I'd buy it again, especially with the affordable price! I bought two!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is very liquid-y and the brush is difficult to control. The brush is not stiff and acts like a fine paintbrush. Eyeliner itself is matte but runs with sweat. Overall it was just ok
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra B

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality and long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and lasts for a while. If you are not very good at applying liner however, I would not recommend this product for you. The brush is very thin and long so you have to be very patient and simply good at applying it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Redd

customer_reviews.title: I got my Refund, Water rasistance,not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: It’s water resistant,good quality but I’m not okay with the liner straw,it’s too long and difficult for me to apply,I purchased bcoz of lots of reviews but I’m beginner in eyeliner so it’s not fit for me. Thankfully they Refund me so nice service.
customer_reviews.author: shivani mishra

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I have been looking for. I work out doors rain or shine. And occasionally my eyes water. It absolutely does it's job. It hasn't smudged or budged. But beware it can be difficult to remove when trying to clean up a line after it's dried.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Yes to the Max
customer_reviews.text: Ya girl cant live without her eyeliner. I wear it constantly. This eyeliner is amazing! Ive cried during the end of the Office with it... It stays. Ive worn it out for almost 24 hours. It stays. Ive jumped in a pool with it... And it mostly stayed! Its cheap and works great so just get it already
customer_reviews.author: Cat Balint Tynan

customer_reviews.title: The nyx eyeliner brush is exactly like the old urban decay liquid eyeliner's brush
customer_reviews.text: I got this eyeliner because of the brush being long. Urban decay changed the brush style on the perversion liquid eyeliner and I hate it! I really prefer the old version. As soon as I used the nyx eyeliner, I fell in love with it! It's exactly how UD brush used to be. Not only did is the nyx eyeliner better, but it is also way cheaper! Win win I'd say 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My go to eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite eyeliner and I haven't bought anything different for years. I love the long applicator making it easy to do wings and detailed liner. Lots of product so it lasts me quite a long time even as someone who does makeup almost daily. IG: @shanarena
customer_reviews.author: Shana Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Best out there!
customer_reviews.text: This is the product i have been looking for! I jave very oily skin and eyeliners are a no for me because they smudge but this product is honestly a game changer. I will not hesitate to say to buy it because it truly does last a long time without smudging.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Thin and hard to apply; extremely flakey
customer_reviews.text: I found the applicator almost impossible to use. There's nowhere to hold on without getting eyeliner on your hands, so you are applying it at a very distant angle that makes accuracy/a straight line nearly impossible. Once it's on, it's on - which I guess would be a plus if it were possible to get it in the right spot. Also, once applied, it flaked little black specks all over all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Really need to practice but good color
customer_reviews.text: I love NYXX and this is a good eyeliner. I just need to practice using liquid applicator but this is still a good one to practice with bc of the price and i love how thin it is.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: If you have a steady hand, this goes on like a dream. I don't, so I don't use it often because once it is on, it stays. And that is great! If you can do your makeup well. I use cold cream to take it off because otherwise, it is there to stay, which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Megan D.

customer_reviews.title: long lasting and easy to apply!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this eyeliner! The thin brush applicator makes it way easier to create a sharp wing look and it lasts all day. Also, I noticed that this liner is much better to work with than the pen style tip. I will definitely be purchasing again and highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Would 100% recommend
customer_reviews.text: This liquid eyeliner is the BEST liner I've ever used. Its matte finish. It last all day. It don't smudge on you. Dries fast but not to fast were you can't apply it. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Stays put all day long
customer_reviews.text: Once the eyeliner is dry it stays put all day long when you want to take it off use an eye make up remover and warm water....definitely recommend if you want your eyeliner to stay put all day long!
customer_reviews.author: C C

customer_reviews.title: Love this eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: It’s taken me a long time to find an eyeliner that is as good as this. The pen is very fluid and thin and gives that perfect cat eye look.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Rose

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to find a good eyeliner. But this one is great! The brush is perfect and the quality including does not have any form of formaldehyde like most of them. It’s not listed but I know what I say. And that’s why people have allergies afterwords in form of itching and swelling their lids.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: From an active teenager. THE BEST !!
customer_reviews.text: SOO I was not expecting it to be that good! It’s such a nice black and very easy to apply. Just wipe the brush as you would a nail polish brush! I’ve been using an elf liquid pen for years and this IS SUCH A GAME CHANGER. I’m yet to test the longevity of it but I have high hopes. ALSO HAS NOT SMEARED. LOVE LOVE LOVE IT ! This is from an active long boarder so I’ll update on how well it last with sweat, wind, water and the day!!
customer_reviews.author: Alysia

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a liquid eyeliner with AN ACTUAL BRUSH for MONTHS at a reasonable price, this guy checks all the boxes, I put this eyeliner on over a winged eyeliner stamp and cooked and served an entire thanksgiving dinner without a single smudge
customer_reviews.author: Faith Boaz

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, waterproof fluid eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of different liquid liners in my day but this is by far the best! The quality is fantastic. Some brushes tend to separate after a while but this one never has for me. It glides on in one even stroke and lasts the rest of the day! Absolutely would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Sturgell

customer_reviews.title: The best eyeliner.
customer_reviews.text: Is very easy to apply , omg is great , the quality and formula are amazing, highly recommend, don’t spend your money on high end product.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I have watery eyes and this lasts all day. Hard to get off with a make up wipe but, I’m sure an oil based make up remover would do the trick just fine. Funeral proof, Laugh proof, sweat proof, watery eye proof.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa M Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Best eye liner
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye liner and won't use anything else. It stays on all day. Doesn't smudge. And it's really easy to apply. Nice thin brush!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Very good liner for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and precise application if done correctly. I absolutely love NYX makeup products. Thank you to the seller for fast shipping and letting my product arrive intact. Highly recommend can't wait to order more and share via social media my experience
customer_reviews.author: GOLDEN GLAMOURZON

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love how matte it is! And how perfectly petite the brush applicator is ! It works soooo weeeelllll, it’s by far my favorite eyeliner
customer_reviews.author: Shoshame parks

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre but you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Eh it’s okay. Nothing special but you definitely get what you pay for and it’s the same eyeliner as advertised. I’m not crazy about the quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Do you want to create wings sharp enough to slay your enemies? If so, buy this.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in hopes that it would be as good as 'Walk the Line' by Hard Candy, which has been discontinued. IT IS WAY BETTER. This product stays all day. Application is easy and beautiful. I can create wings sharp enough to slay my enemies. 10/10 would recommend. And will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: danielle b.

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s matte it’s a very liquidy formula and tends to splatter on my hand when I’m trying my o get some of the excess eyeliner off the brush and onto the side. It’s a pretty good eyeliner. I bought it when it was like 4$ but idk if it’s worth almost 7$ for how much you get
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite eyeliner. Easy slim tip but not a thin line all the way through so it makes achieving that chisel wing look with a sharp end easier to do.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: my favorite eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I love a dark bam!! eyeliner on top to finish a smokey eye. I have used maybelline and L'Oreal and this was my favorite thus far. Its not a bad price either.
customer_reviews.author: Callie green

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING I SWEAR
customer_reviews.text: THE best eyeliner ever, the only thing that sucks about it is the brush. Me personally, I was able to work with it and get a clean cat eye look! Best formula ever and also a nice matte look after it dries. I work as a CNA and it lasts the whole shifts. No cracks, no smudges, nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Amparo

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and amazing!
customer_reviews.text: NYX is a fabulous and affordable brand. The eyeliner is extremely black! This is a brush applicator. It lasts all day-I wear from about 6 am until 8 on, and it looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Leesha O

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my one of my staples. I have sensitive eyes so I have to be careful with certain products. This one doesn’t burn my lid, stays on all day, never smudges and is black as hell.
customer_reviews.author: osiris

product_meta.title: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Matte Liquid Eyeliner, Black
product_meta.description: Line and define with expert precision using our Matte Liquid Liner. A makeup artist must-have for bold and classic looks the precision brush tip allows you to effortlessly achieve an ultra-fine and exquisite matte finish. Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Propylene Glycol, Acrylates/Octylacrylamide Copolymer, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Triethylhexyl Trimellitate, Triethyl Citrate, Ethyl Lactate, Xanthan Gum, Hectorite, Cellulose, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Aminomethyl Propanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol. MAY CONTAIN / PEUT CONTENIR (+/-): Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Black 2 (CI 77266) [Nano].
feature_bullets: LIQUID EYELINER: Draw winged eyeliner with expert precision using our Matte Liquid Liner. A makeup artist's must-have precision liquid eyeliner pen for bold to classic eyeliner looks!

INCLUDES PRECISION BRUSH: The ultra-fine precision eyeliner brush tip allows Max control when drawing thin to thick buildable lines, while the matte black formula offers exquisite matte-finished, smudgeproof coverage.

EYE MAKEUP FOR THE PERFECT POP: Eyeliners are just the tip of the iceberg when it comes to eye makeup! Try our complete line of eye makeup including eyeshadow singles and palettes, false lashes, mascara, liquid eyeliner & eyebrow pencils and more.
CRUELTY FREE COSMETICS: We believe animals belong in our arms—not in a lab. All of our makeup is PETA certified cruelty-free. We don't test any of our products on animals.

DISCOVER NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP: Try all our pro makeup & beauty products, from eyeshadow palette, liquid eyeliner & eyeliner pencils, mascara & false lashes to lipstick, lip gloss, foundation, primer, blush, bronzer, highlighters, brushes & more!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
